org.bitcoinj.core

Class AbstractManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bitcoinj.core.Message
      • org.bitcoinj.core.AbstractManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChainLocksHandler, DeterministicMasternodeListManager, EvolutionUserManager, GovernanceManager, MasternodeMetaDataManager, NetFullfilledRequestManager, SimplifiedMasternodeListManager, SPVInstantSendDatabase, SPVRecoveredSignaturesDatabase

    public abstract class AbstractManager
extends Message
    Created by Hash Engineering on 6/21/2016. Base class for all Dash Manager objects. Derived classes must implement Message.parse() and Message.bitcoinSerializeToStream(OutputStream) to to serialize data to a file with FlatDB.
